name: Parallel Slide
description:
An infinite runner that has 2 players playing in 2 parallel yet different worlds. 

The game is intended to be played in single player mode but your friends can help too!
Game Rules and Controls:
 - If you hit anything you die except for coins, which give extra points.
 - If any of the 2 players die the game ends.
 - The Blue character can be controlled by W or the Up Arrow, the Pink character can be controlled by S or the Down Arrow.

Creators:
 - Sarah Katerji, Mohammad Kurjieh, Zoulfikar Chmayssani
